StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetJROTCByID]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@CollegePro.leJROTCID uniqueiden..er
AS SET NOCOUNT ON
SELECT cpjr.[CollegePro.leJROTCID] AS JROTCID, cpjr.SchoolName, SchoolYear, cpjr.Service, sr.[SERVICE] AS ServiceDescrip.on, Popula.on AS NumPopula.on, cpjr.Organiza.onID, cpjr.UserLogin
FROM [MCRISS].[USMC].[CollegePro.leJROTC] cpjr INNER JOIN [dbo].[SERVICE] sr ON cpjr.Service = sr.SERVICE_CODE
WHERE cpjr.CollegePro.leJROTCID = @CollegePro.leJROTCID
--- CLEAN UP SET NOCOUNT OFF
